WorkItem.Description:
I'm using Firefox 3.6.2, Windows 7 64 Bit, using Rawr 3 through elitistjerks.com/rawr.php is fine.
Clicking "Install Offline" creates a new shortcut on my desktop.
Using this Shortcut ("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Silverlight\sllauncher.exe" 2689230047.elitistjerks.com) opens up rawr3 in a new window, showing me this Error:
 
[IsolatedStorage_Init]
Argumente:
Debuggingressourcen-Zeichenfolgen sind nicht verfügbar. Oft enthalten der Schlüssel und die Argumente genügend Informationen zur Diagnose des Problems. Weitere Informationen erhalten Sie unter http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=3.0.50106.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=IsolatedStorage_Init
 
   bei System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.FetchOrCreateGroup(String groupName, Boolean retry)
   bei System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.FetchOrCreateGroup(String groupName)
   bei System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStore(String group, String id)
   bei System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication()
   bei Rawr.UI.FileUtils.DownloadIfNotExists(EventHandler callback)
   bei Rawr.UI.LoadScreen.iq_Closed(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   bei Rawr.UI.LoadScreen.LoadFiles()
   bei Rawr.UI.LoadScreen.StartLoading(EventHandler callback)
   bei Rawr.Silverlight.App.Application_Startup(Object sender, StartupEventArgs e)
   bei System.Windows.CoreInvokeHandler.InvokeEventHandler(Int32 typeIndex, Delegate handlerDelegate, Object sender, Object args)
   bei MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, String eventName)
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Error when opening from Desktop Shortcut

Comments.Message: That looks like you somehow said 'no' to allowing Rawr to save data locally. Did you do anything weird with that?
